definition: to wade/to be involved/to concern/to experience/to enter (classical)
"water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
a step/a pace/walk/march/stages in a process/situation
to be a suspect (in a crime)/to be suspected of
to set foot in/to step into/to become involved for the first time
to skim (through a book)/to read cursorily/to dip into
to see the world/to go out into society/to gain experience
to travel over land and water (idiom)
She county in Handan 邯鄲|邯郸[Han2 dan1], Hebei

sentences.english: The effort involved in accommodating all of the stakeholders in the process of architecting should not be underestimated.
sentences.chinese: 在架構過程中不應低估適應所有涉衆所付出的努力。

sentences.english: It established the scope and secured stakeholder buy-in for the entire project.
sentences.chinese: 它爲整個項目確定了範圍和被擔保的項目涉衆買進。

sentences.english: Drive participation and buy-in, from start to finish.
sentences.chinese: 從開始到結束，鼓勵涉衆加入其中。

sentences.english: Perhaps the project manager publishes a document on a portal and invites comments from multiple stakeholders.
sentences.chinese: 也許項目經理在入口處提供文檔，希望涉衆給予建議。

sentences.english: Measurement supports communication among stakeholders across all levels of the organization.
sentences.chinese: 度量支持跨於組織所有級別的涉衆之間的溝通。

sentences.english: The stakeholders did not define goals and objectives as well as cross-organizational roles and responsibilities.
sentences.chinese: 涉衆沒有定義目的和目標以及跨組織的角色和職責。
不知水深淺，切勿涉河灘。

sentences.english: Viewpoints are mechanisms to address program stakeholders' needs.
sentences.chinese: 視點是處理程序涉衆需求的機制。

sentences.english: An architectural description identifies one or more stakeholders.
sentences.chinese: 一條構架描述識別一個或多個涉衆。

sentences.english: The project lifecycle provides stakeholders and team members with visibility and decision points throughout the project.
sentences.chinese: 項目生命週期爲涉衆和團隊成員提供可見度和決策點。

sentences.english: The business case definition and involvement of business stakeholders was minimal.
sentences.chinese: 業務案例定義和業務涉衆的參與非常少。

sentences.english: And he keeps his stakeholders well-informed on this progress.
sentences.chinese: 並且他在進行過程中與項目涉衆保持良好的溝通。

sentences.english: This allows for ongoing stakeholder feedback and mid-course corrections.
sentences.chinese: 該方法慮及了項目涉衆反饋和中期修正。

sentences.english: To cross(a body of water)at a ford.
sentences.chinese: 不知水深淺，切勿涉河灘。

sentences.english: Each process represents concepts that should be clear to non-technical stakeholders.
sentences.chinese: 每個流程都代表非技術涉衆應該清楚瞭解的概念。

definition: to adjudicate/to finish a trial/to try and pass verdict
to transfer (a case, a person, files etc)
to conclude a case/to wind up
to investigate and handle (a criminal case)
to sequester/to seize (assets)/to seal up/to close down
